name: Collaboration Panel
description:
Description

Game where you use "collaboration panel" to control NPC.  to be more specific you manipulate certain values of NPC like, direction vector, speed, jump force, color and scale. you must direct character toward level end to win.

Controls

Press Esc to open collaboration panel,  change values and press proceed. arrow shows your direction.

Game footage + why you should play 10 Level Easy to understand gameplay Atmospheric levels Cool controls Satisfying gameplay feel Instruction: 

download > unzip > play

btw made second game for this game jam too please check out :) Name : "Ant and Flea". Thanks
